title: Works for Me
author: St. John
citation: St. John. "Works for Me: experience with St. John's Wort (ID 78911)". Erowid.org. May 21, 2009. erowid.org/exp/78911
footer:
[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report: For me st. john's wort is comparable to 20 mg prozac twice a day. I take it as recommended by the manufacturer and have tremendous results. I was on prozac for a few years for depression, then I stopped taking it because I thought I did not need it. Then I met my wife who introduced me to the wort and it makes me feel as if I am on prozac and it's completely all natural.
